name: shmup with very bad title
description:
More a demo than a full game. You have to survive every wave of enemies that spawn every 10 seconds. At the 10th wave you fight the boss. If people really like the game I'll expand it. Controls

Move the mouse to move the spaceship

Left Mouse Button to shoot

Enter or space to pause the game

Made with Godot Engine

Music made by Zanilis

Pre-made assets

Sfx effects

Characters sprites - https://medimongames.itch.io/pixel-spaceships-hd (Please check his work and help him)
